General.Name: Baselode Energy Corp
General.Description: Baselode Energy Corp. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for uranium, silver, and cobalt deposits. The company holds interests in the Mann project located in the Shining Tree district of Ontario; and Shadow, Hook, and Catharsis projected located in the Athabasca Basin area of northern Saskatchewan. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 55 University Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2H7
